actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.

official_title: To amend the Magnunson-Stevens Fishery Conservation and Management Act to improve implementation of the western Alaska community development quota program, and for other purposes.
short_title: Western Alaska Community Development Quota Program Implementation Improvement Act of 2000

summary.text: Western Alaska Community Development Quota Program Implementation Improvement Act of 2000 - Amends Magnuson-Stevens Fishery Conservation and Management Act provisions relating to the western Pacific community development program to allocate percentages of Bering Sea directed fisheries and to modify eligibility and other requirements.

titles.title: Western Alaska Community Development Quota Program Implementation Improvement Act of 2000
To amend the Magnunson-Stevens Fishery Conservation and Management Act to improve implementation of the western Alaska community development quota program, and for other purposes.
